actions.command: execute at @s as @e[distance=1..4,type=!#libra:undead] run effect give @s minecraft:instant_damage 1 1 false
execute at @s as @e[distance=1..4,type=#libra:undead] run effect give @s minecraft:instant_health 1 1 false

name: Steel wing
description: Use a firework from your off-hand mid-air in order to cut your enemies with your wings. You only deal damage on the first frame after you use a firework, so timing it is crucial.
